headline: Robinhood, Applovin jump as S&P 500 reshuffle boosts index entrants
summary: Investing.com -- Shares of Robinhood Markets Inc (NASDAQ:HOOD) surged 7.1% in after-hours trading Friday, following the announcement of its inclusion in the S&P 500 index. The trading platform is joined by Applovin Corp (NASDAQ:APP), which climbed 7.4%, and EMCOR Group Inc (NYSE:EME), up 2.6%, highlighting investor enthusiasm after S&P Dow Jones Indices unveiled sweeping changes to its major benchmarks.

raw.headline: Robinhood, Applovin jump as S&P 500 reshuffle boosts index entrants

The trading platform is joined by Applovin Corp (NASDAQ:APP), which climbed 7.4%, and EMCOR Group Inc (NYSE:EME), up 2.6%, highlighting investor enthusiasm after S&P Dow Jones Indices unveiled sweeping changes to its major benchmarks.

headline: AppLovin, Robinhood, and Emcor Rally on News They Will Join the S&P 500. Here’s Who Didn’t Make the Cut.
summary: AppLovin Robinhood Markets  and  Emcor Group  will join the S&P 500 index later in September in conjunction with the index’s quarterly rebalancing, according to S&P Dow Jones Indices, which oversees the benchmark index.  Applovin and Robinhood have often been mentioned as candidates for inclusion this year, because they were among the largest companies by market capitalization not in the S&P 500 index.  Applovin stock was up 6.3% in after-hours trading to $521.01, while Robinhood was up 6.4% to $107.75 and Emcor was 2.2% higher at $639.

headline: AppLovin, Robinhood Markets and Emcor Group Set to Join S&P 500; Others to Join S&P 100, S&P MidCap 400 and S&P SmallCap 600
summary: S&P Dow Jones Indices ("S&P DJI") will make the following changes to the S&P 100, S&P 500, S&P MidCap 400, and S&P SmallCap 600 indices effective prior to the open of trading on Monday, September 22, to coincide with the quarterly rebalance. The changes ensure each index is more representative of its market capitalization range. The companies being removed from the S&P SmallCap 600 are no longer representative of the small-cap market space.

headline: Robinhood, AppLovin Additions Lead S&P 500 Index Changes
summary: Three companies will be joining the S&P 500 later this month.

headline: AppLovin, Robinhood To Join S&P 500. The Stocks Are Jumping.
summary: AppLovin and Robinhood will join the S&P 500 index before the open on Sept. 22, S&P Global said. APP stock and HOOD jumped in late trading.

headline: MarketAxess Announces Trading Volume Statistics for August 2025
summary: NEW YORK, September 05, 2025--MarketAxess Holdings Inc. (Nasdaq: MKTX), the operator of a leading electronic trading platform for fixed-income securities, today announced trading volume and preliminary variable transaction fees per million ("FPM") for August 2025.1
